comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Construction of the Finger Wharf which was completed in 1915, indicates this is about 1914.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The MANNHEIM (5878 tons, Captain Mildahn, German-Australian S. S. Co.Ltd., agents) arrived in Sydney from Brisbane on 24/5/1914 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15510464 . And left for Antwerp and Hamburg on 29/5/1914 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15511800 . So May 1914. Almost exactly where Harry's Cafe de Wheels is now!- GoogleMapsStreetView

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks Beachcomber :) Fascinating to see the streetscape compared to now!
